settings.title: Furniture Rental
settings.content:
If you need a piece for a product shoot, film or photography, our pieces are truly unique and photogenic! All in-stock pieces displayed in our showroom are available for rent to insured professionals.Â 

For inquiries on pricing and availability, please fill out the form.

settings.title: Have a question?
settings.content: Feel free to email us directly at shop@habitus.ca or give us a call at 519-601-9931.
